name: @dsnp/contracts
description: Official DSNP Interfaces, Contracts, and ABIs

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:parent && npm run build:copyAbis && npm run build:copyMarkdown
scripts.build:copyAbis: mkdir -p abi && find ../artifacts/contracts -type f -name "*.json" ! -name  "*.dbg.json" -not -path "*/mocks/*"  -exec cp {} abi/ \;
